dialogue.htmlContent:
A strange little shop appears in the walkway. It's little more than a ramshackle tent like structure made of gauzy cloth. Flickering fire light from inside casts erotically writing shadows against the deceptively thin cloth. You can't quit make out what's going on, but the subtle gasps and moans drifting in the air are enough to tell you it has to be an intense experience.

There's a strange symbol, cast in gold, mounted above the door. It's not a symbol you recognize, and the more you look at it the more your eyes seem to slide off it. #IF(pc.isAbleToOrgasm()) You find yourself unable to move any closer to the shop and get the feeling that you would not be welcome inside if you could. You can almost hear it telling you to return only when you seek that which is denied. #ELSE Somehow, the shape is strangely inviting, as though it wants you to come inside. It hints at a release to your yearning, if you're willing to pay the price. #ENDIF

As you force your way closer to the shop, a female lion-morph bursts through the shop's door with purple sparks of arcane power crackling around her body. [deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(You would dare cross this barrier?)] Her eyes scan the alley way and lock with your own.

[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(You!)] The word comes out a more of a roar than human speech.

[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(If I needed another slave, I'd collar you right now. It so happens I don't. On the other hand, I can't leave your insolence unpunished either.)] She looks at your for a moment, contemplating her options.

[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(Perhaps a taste of what you're missing.)] There's a little blue pill in her hand that you realizes se is about to force you to swallow.
[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(A pitty)] She growls and disappears, along with her shop, in a puff of purple smoke.

The little blue pill easily slides down your throat, and after only a few moments you [pc.verb(feel)] a pulsing warmth taking root deep within your loins. An arcane glow surrounds you for a moment crotch and then fades away. You have the feeling that you've lost something that was very important to you.

[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(Now that that's over with, you're welcome to come inside and look around!)]
[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(You're a better fighter than I expected, but it doesn't matter.)] She growls as The Doll Maker and her shop disappear in a puff of purple smoke.
[deniedDollMaker_TheDollMaker.speech(Welcome to my humble little shop! Please do have a look around.)]
